body:
Comment 2: 
I see no problem with "godoc html | less" command here on mingw. Is it possible that
your "less" command is different from mine? Perhaps it exits early for some reason.

Ian, I don't understand what you are saying. On Windows, programs can't send "signals"
to each other. The only thing that less can do is close its end of the pipe, this will
look like syscall returned with an error on godoc side.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
